Module mscript
Package com.github.The127.MScript.models

Interface IScriptContext

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IFunctionContext
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ScriptModel
    public interface IScriptContext
extends IFunctionContext
    This interface defines the script/compile context api.

    • Method Detail

      • resolveAlias

        java.lang.String resolveAlias​(java.lang.String alias,
                              FileContext ctx)
        Resolves a device alias into a basic device name.
        Parameters:
        alias - The device alias.
        ctx - The file context of the access to the device alias for error handling.
        Returns:
        The basic name of the device.

      • resolverConst

        double resolverConst​(java.lang.String name,
                     FileContext ctx)
        Resolves a constant to its value.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the constant.
        ctx - The file context of the access to the constant for error handling.
        Returns:
        The value of the constant.

      • doesFunctionExist

        boolean doesFunctionExist​(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if a function (excluding the main function) exists.
        Parameters:
        name - The function name to check.
        Returns:
        True if the function exists.

      • getFunctionParameterCount

        int getFunctionParameterCount​(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the function.
        Returns:
        The parameter count for that function.
